What is space tourism?

Space tourism is the practice of traveling to and experiencing space for
leisure, recreational, or business purposes. It is a relatively new industry, but it has the potential
to become a major sector of the tourism industry in the future.

Who can go on an Astrocruise trip?

Currently, Astrocruise trips are only available to individuals who are in good physical and mental health
and can afford the high cost of the trip. Passengers must also be at least 18 years of age,
as well as pass a medical evaluation.

How much does an Astrocruise trip cost?

The cost of an Astrocruise trip can vary significantly depending on the length and nature of the trip,
as well as the conditions of the destination. For more information, visit our Pricing section.

Is space tourism safe?

Like any form of travel, space tourism carries some risks. However,
space tourism companies are working to develop technologies
and procedures to ensure the safety of their passengers.

What kind of training will I need to undergo?

We require passengers to undergo training before going on a trip.
This training may include physical conditioning, spaceflight simulations, and
education about the specifics of space travel.

Any questions? Visit our Contact page. You can also Email us at help@AstroCruise.com or call us at 1800-ASTRO.
